text: Morehead State University is a public, co-educational university in Morehead, Kentucky. The university has about 9,509 students. It was founded in 1887. The current president of the university is Dr. Wayne D. Andrews. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Eagles. They have 18 varsity teams and they compete in the Ohio Valley Conference. ==Other websites== *Morehead State University's Official website *Morehead State Eagles' Official athletics website Category:Ohio Valley Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Kentucky Category:1887 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in Kentucky
title: Morehead State University
